result.reason: Smart/dynamic connection groups (e.g. 'Connected', 'Recent') would improve UX by surfacing active and frequently-used connections automatically, a common feature in remote management tools.
result.approach: Add a SmartGroupType enum (Connected, Recent, Favorite), implement dynamic population logic in ConnectionTreeModel that filters based on runtime state (active RDP/SSH sessions) and persisted history, render smart groups as virtual non-editable nodes in the connection tree UI
